page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: Holton-le-Moor school was opened in 1914 when there were 66 pupils ranging from 5-15years of age.Now there are 46 pupils ranging from 5-11.The pupils come from Holton-le-Moor&from the outlying villages of Claxby,Moortown,Owersby & North Kelsey.About 32 pupils travel to school by bus,5 come by car and 9 walk. It is a church aided school which means that the Governors of the school are responsible for the maintenance of the outside of the school buildings and the school grounds. There are 5 members of staff-the Head-Mrs.Glue,the assistant teacher-Mrs.Brewis,the part-time teacher-Mra.Thompson,thesecretary-Mrs. Kent and the caretaker-Mrs.Clayton.
